reviews.review_msg: Sneddon is good. She cares about her students. She's smart and she doesn't like to feel that a student is trying to one up her. Taken multiple classes with her and tbh I miss the old Sneddon, old Sneddon was awesome, current Sneddon is 'mid'. I feel like the system sucked the energy out of her. I just wish she didn't go off topic so much, def ADHD
goat professor. would take it again, made the lectures interesting and fun
She got off topic a lot and talks about random stuff, which got me distracted from the class and from the material
